official_title: A bill to provide paid leave to Federal and District of Columbia government employees while they are preparing for or participating in certain international athletic competitions as members of the official team of the United States.

summary.text: Athletic Opportunities Assistance Act of 1979 - Grants paid leave to any Federal or District of Columbia employee participating as a member of an official United States team in any world, Pan American, or Olympic competition.

titles.title: A bill to provide paid leave to Federal and District of Columbia government employees while they are preparing for or participating in certain international athletic competitions as members of the official team of the United States.
